section.name: Properties of the maven-javanet-plugin plugin
section.p: This plugin recognizes the following properties.

tr.td: The name of the folder in your documents and files section to which distribution files are uploaded. Used by the javanet:dist goal. It can be something like "/release".
The CVSROOT variable used to connect to the java.net CVS server. Used by the javanet:dist goal.
